step.cmd: Click on the Abstract Calls tab, and click New button

ul.li: Enable Attachments - when checked, submitters can upload documentation to support their submission
Enable Access Permissions - when checked, staff user can identify active badge assignments that must be held to participate as submitter or a reviewer
Page URL - display URL through which portal users can review Abstract Call, make submission or access submissions assigned for review
Submission Dates - date range for making submissions
Review Dates - date range given to the reviewers to complete assignments
Maximum Number of Submissions - total number of submission that a single submitter can make within an Abstract Call
Submissions Field Set - API name of field set that defines the fields to be displayed on the submission form
Filter Field - API name for the field that will populate the filter field on the Call Topic table
Author Field Set - API name fof the field set to gather details about the authors
Reviewer Field Set- API name of field set used to capture details about the reviewer
Reviewer Submission Field Set-API name of field set that defines the submission fields to be displayed to the reviewer
Review Instructions - Intructional text that will be displayed to the reviewer about the review process and their responsibilities
